Package be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorUtils
    This class allow to transform a rgb value into a tikz supported color Java Code to get a color name from rgb/hex value/awt color This code was heavily inspired by the following solution: stack overflow https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4126029/convert-rgb-values-to-color-name
    ColorUtils.ColorName
    This is a subClass of ColorUtils.
    ViewSwitcher
    Class that handles the switching from one screen to another during interaction with the application
    ViewUtility
    Collection of utility functions used in the view and related to javaFX
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ViewName
    List of names representing the different screens that can be shown to the user
